body:
[Delegates/Countries at SFRRI Biennial Meetings](/admin/files/uploads/sfrri_delegates_attending_biennial_conferences.pdf)

**1982 1st Uxbridge, Great Britain**

**1984 2nd York, Great Britain**

**1986 3rd Dusseldorf, Germany**

**1988 4th Kyoto, Japan**

**1990 5th Pasadena, USA**

**1992 6th Turin, Italy**

**1994 7th Sydney, Australia**

**1996 8th Barcelona, Spain**

**1998 9th San Paulo, Brazil**

**2000 10th Kyoto, Japan**

**2002 11th Paris, France**

**2004 12th Buenos Aires, Argentina**

**2006 13th Davos, Switzerland**

**2008 14th Beijing, China**

**2010 15th Orlando, Florida, USA**

**[2012 16th London, Great Britain](/www.sfrrimeeting.org/index.html)**

**[2014 17th Kyoto, Japan](/www.sfrri2014.org/index.html)**

Photos from SFRRI 2014 Gala Dinner: [www.flickr.com/photos/sfrri2014/](https://www.flickr.com/photos/sfrri2014/)

Photos from SFRRI Chairperson Dinner: [www.flickr.com/gp/sfrri2014/43TwPM/](https://www.flickr.com/gp/sfrri2014/43TwPM)
